__TOC__

The following is the release process for Ubuntu 4.10 (The Warty Warthog Warthog Release):

** CD Images to be Built by UTC 2200 Tuesday
** An announcement to the list requesting testing for very bad regressions will be sent immediately
** If no new RC problems are found, these CD images will be named "warty-i386-rc1.iso" and published in the appropriate directories at UTC 0600 on Wednesday 13 October
** An announcement will be sent to mirrors
** At 1200 UTC on Wednesday we will announce the RC

Announcements to:

** LWN, debian, python
** jdub,mako to provide others
